title: Claymore [Manga] [translated->Eng] [Vol1->13]
description:
Manga-Sketchbook.org Says
=========================
In a world where monsters called Yoma prey on humans and live among them in disguise, humanity&#039;s only hope is a new breed of warrior known as Claymores. Half human, half monster, these silver-eyed slayers possess supernatural strength, but are condemned to fight their savage impulses or lose their humanity completely.

Mosh Says
=========
Great manga! Awesome action manga, but don&#039;t compare it to other action mangas, great storyline that keeps you wishing for some more volumes [haven&#039;t found them yet, hold ya horses :P].
Actually, i can say its one of the best Mangas i&#039;ve seen. The anime makes the manga seem like God btw. Tho follows the storyline pretty good too [the anime is NOT posted].

Hope you like it. Seed it :)
